about_the_game:
Demo Version Announcement

A free DEMO version of "Winter Girl" has been released!

In the DEMO version, you can enjoy some of the game's content.
Experience how the game starts and please look forward to the full release.

After playing, we kindly ask for your support in promoting the game so that many people can enjoy the full version.

Introduction/Features

"Winter Girl" is a visual novel that tells the story of a chance encounter with "Seah," an alien.
Enjoy dates with her as she learns about Earth, and take time to get to know each other.

Animated Cutscenes

Enjoy Winter Girl's spectacular animated cutscenes and camera direction.
You won't forget the special moments spent with the two heroines.

Choices and Branching Endings

You'll progress through the story via conversations and interactions with the two heroines.
Choose how to treat her and what to say.
The ending will change based on your choices.

Various Entertainment Features

Chat with the heroine Lumi through a tablet, and search for sightings of Seah in the world of social media.
There are also various mini-games prepared for your enjoyment.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game provides simple interactions through clicking on specific body parts.
Apart from that, there are no direct textual or visual sexual depictions.

name: Winter Girl Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

kgrb.descriptors:
게임물 제명 : 겨울소녀
이용 등급 : 15세이용가 (15+)
포함 내용 : 선정성
등급분류일자 : 2024.04.23
등급분류번호 : SGHS-SP-240423-0002

short_description: 'Winter Girl' is a visual novel game that begins with a miraculous encounter with the alien, Seah. Combining modern direction with classic visual novel charm, it offers an immersive story and interactions. Experience various endings based on your choices.
supported_languages:
English, Korean*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
